inclusion.criterion: paraffin blocks of tumor that must be sent for analysis
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Karnofsky Performance Status greater than or equal to 60
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Adequate laboratory values as described by the protocol
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Life expectancy of greater than 12 weeks
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patient must be able to undergo serial MR imaging
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients must be on an enzyme-inducing anti-epileptic drug(s) as listed in the protocol
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: No steroids or a stable dose of steroids for at least 5 days or a decreasing dose
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Mini-mental status examination of 15 or greater
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Prior chemotherapy or cranial radiation therapy for glioblastoma
exclusion.label: triggers
exclusion.evidence: Therapy included field radiation t10-l1 followed by 11 cycles of temozolomide

exclusion.criterion: Prior biologic or immunotherapy less than 2 weeks prior to registration
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Pleural effusion or ascites that causes respiratory compromise
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger
exclusion.evidence: Patient does not have pleural effusion or ascites.

notes: Unknown Karnofsky Performance Status, laboratory values, life expectancy, and mini-mental status examination. Patient has high-dose steroids which may trigger exclusion criterion 'No steroids or a stable dose of steroids for at least 5 days or a decreasing dose'.
